title: How to Start a Rampage in Grand Theft Auto III

steps.headline: Get every weapon (Baseball bat, pistol, sub-machine gun, AK-47, M4, Rocket Launcher, Grenades, Molotov cocktails)
Get health up to max and full armor.
Go get a slow-mo pill for slow motion.
Punch pedestrians or use molotov cocktail till you get wanted.
Shoot with pistol to the cop.
Get shotgun and shoot with smg kill till 3 stars.
Get you ak or m4 out and kill till 5 stars.
Get rocket or grenade till you're out off.
You will die or get caught for sure.

text: Get every weapon (Baseball bat, pistol, sub-machine gun, AK-47, M4, Rocket Launcher, Grenades, Molotov cocktails)  Get health up to max and full armor.  Go get a slow-mo pill for slow motion.  Punch pedestrians or use molotov cocktail till you get wanted.  Shoot with pistol to the cop.  Get shotgun and shoot with smg kill till 3 stars.  Get you ak or m4 out and kill till 5 stars.  Get rocket or grenade till you're out off.  Rob a tank.  You will die or get caught for sure.  Repeat.
